intro: Langsdorffia rubiginosa, commonly known as the rusty langsdorffia, is a flowering plant native to South Africa. It belongs to the Acanthaceae family and is characterized by its striking, tubular flowers that range in color from red to orange. The plant typically grows as a herbaceous perennial, reaching heights of up to 1 meter. Its foliage consists of opposite, ovate leaves with a velvety texture and a reddish tinge. It thrives in well-drained soils and full sun, making it a popular choice for ornamental gardening.
